name: Wild Magic
description: Your innate magic is suffused with unpredictable energy that erupts in random effects.

1.name: Wild Magic Surge
1.description: After casting a sorcerer spell, the DM may have you roll on the Wild Magic Surge table to create a random magical effect.

1.name: Tides of Chaos
1.description: Gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw; the DM can later force a Wild Magic Surge to restore this feature.

6.name: Bend Luck
6.description: As a reaction, spend 2 sorcery points to add or subtract 1d4 from another creature's roll.

14.name: Controlled Chaos
14.description: Whenever you roll on the Wild Magic Surge table, roll twice and choose either result.

18.name: Spell Bombardment
18.description: When you roll the highest number on a damage die for a spell, roll that die again and add it to the damage once per turn.
